name: sbcov
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s0, s0, w0)))

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s0, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s0, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

stmt.origin: sbbii(s0, s1, wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s0, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

comment: Version of ~ sbco with a disjoint variable condition using fewer axioms. (Contributed by Gino Giotto, 7-Aug-2023.)
